amendment.description: To prohibit the storage of mercury from the National Defense Stockpile at certain facilities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3244 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3244 proposed by Senator Sessions for Senator Bennett. (consideration: CR S6478-6479) To prohibit the storage of mercury from the National Defense Stockpile at certain facilities.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3244 proposed by Senator Sessions for Senator Bennett.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3244 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
